results.title: Computers in the Mining Industry
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Living with Computers”.
An expert talks about the use of computers in the mining industry, a paper presented to the Junior World Computer Congress, Melbourne 16-18 October 1980.

results.title: Assertive skills training (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Chrysalis Films and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This program uses a series of playlets to illustrate unassertive behaviour, the benefits resulting from assertive behaviour and better communication in personal interactions. The six segments are entitled; Work, Couples, Families, Conversations, Requests, Neighbours.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Chrysalis Films and South Australian Film Corporation
results.description: This program uses a series of playlets to illustrate unassertive behaviour, the benefits resulting from assertive behaviour and better communication in personal interactions. The six segments are entitled; Work, Couples, Families, Conversations, Requests, Neighbours.

results.title: Women breakout
results.creator_credit: Erika Addis and Halfway House Collective
results.brief_description: This film was made by the Halfway House Collective in Melbourne and is set in Halfway House a feminist refuge. The film does not so much focus on the circumstances that led them to the Halfway House, rather it shows the house giving them support to take control of and change their lives.

results.title: Australian vintage
results.creator_credit: Peter Thompson, Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation and Film Australia
results.brief_description: This film explores the development of the wine industry in Australia with particular reference to Australia’s international status as a wine producing country. Features an appearance by winemaker and writer Len Evans.

results.title: Mining in Action
results.creator_credit: Harold Dews, Conzinc Riotinto of Australia and Cinesound Movietone
results.brief_description: Surveys the development of mining operations of Hammersley Iron and Bougainville copper, the lead/zinc operation of the company and the opening of the aluminium smelter at Bluff, New Zealand.

results.title: The Rabies threat
results.creator_credit: Don Murray, Antonio Colacino and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Shows the problems caused by the animal disease rabies, and outlines the work of the Animal Quarantine Service which functions to keep out of Australia all exotic animal diseases.
